rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 13 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 5:02 PM, 26 June 2025(Thursday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Quezon, Zambales, Tarlac, Pampanga and Batangas within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Laguna(Pila, Santa Cruz, Lumban, Kalayaan, Paete, Pakil, Pangil, Siniloan, Mabitac), Rizal(Jala-Jala, Rodriguez), Nueva Ecija(Lupao, San Jose, General Tinio, Carranglan) and Bulacan(Dona Remedios Trinidad, Norzagaray) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
